title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\ConversationEvent
name: ConversationEvent
description:
Represents a notification sent to Pub/Sub subscribers for conversation lifecycle events.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.ConversationEvent

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.conversation
params.description: The unique identifier of the conversation this notification refers to. Format: projects/<Project ID>/conversations/<Conversation ID>.

params.name: data.type
params.description: The type of the event that this notification refers to.

params.name: data.error_status
params.description: More detailed information about an error. Only set for type UNRECOVERABLE_ERROR_IN_PHONE_CALL.
